channel.title: Administration of Kong API Gateway on Express Serverless Platform
channel.description: Recent content in Administration of Kong API Gateway on Express Serverless Platform

item.title: API Gateways Comparison: Features & Pricing of Kong vs. Express Gateway
item.description: Kong API Gateway VS. Express Gateway Two popular open source projects – two very different approaches. We’ve gotten a lot of questions about what to look for in an API Gateway, what is an API Gateway and even how an API gateway fits into your Microservices architecture. So, let’s take a deeper look at all of this and more as we break down the differences (and similarities) of the most popular projects for the API Gateway use case.
